_header: Ye Briton Martyrs famous in perfectness
_description: John Lydgate, Prayer to British Saints, particularly St. Ursula — three 8-line stanzas and a couplet

CamJes56.First Lines:
[Y]E briton martirs famous in parfitnesOf herte a vowid in youre
                    tender age…
CamJes56.Last Lines:
…Shall be menys to þi magnificenceVs to socoure lorde
                    when we to þe call

CamSidney37.First Lines:
YE bruton martirs famous in perfinesse Off hert anoned in yowre
                    tendir age…
CamSidney37.Last Lines:
…Schalle menys to thi magnificence Vs to socoure lord whan we
                    to the callel

CamTCC601.First Lines:
YE brytoun martyrs famous in parfytenesse Of hert avowed in yowre
                    tendyr Age To perseuer in vyrginall clennesse ffre from the yok &
                    bond of mariage…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Shalbe meanes to thy magnificence Vs to socour lord when we
                    to the call
CamTCC601.Attributed Author:
Lydgate (added after Explicit by later hand, prob. John Stow’s; f.
                        169v).

BLHar2255.First Lines:
YE Bryton martirs famous in parfitnesseOf herte avowyd in your
                    tendir Age…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…Shal be meenys to thy magnificenceVs to socoure lord whan we
                    to the calle
